I just downloaded this app (07/04/20) and may I say, itâ€™s absolutely HORRIBLE. For starters, the loading screen is frightening, I mean, who openly WANTS to stare at Trumps nasty face? Secondly, the app is extremely biased. None of the news sources are credible. If I wanted news from a garbage source, I wouldâ€™ve watched Fox News instead. The whole point of the app is to get you to rate it 5 stars, which is annoying.
  Anyways, I donâ€™t recommend downloading this app and waste your storage space. If you want some VALID news sources watch The Young Turks (TYT) or Kyle Kollinski on YouTube!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what all the hype was about but it truly is awful. No functionality without entering a phone number and ACCEPTING a subscription to his messaging service. YOU ALSO HAVE TO ENTER your email and zip code. Once I regretfully did all of this, the app was full of DANGEROUS and MISLEADING headlines. I immediately saw one about hydroxychloroquineâ€™s positive effects on coronavirus, which has already led to more unnecessary death. It also displays misleading headlines about Trumpâ€™s accomplishments that were actually the direct result of the Obama administration. Never again! Donâ€™t underestimate the power of the younger generation.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrific. Fake News!
